name: Runaway Race
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2019. The theme was "only one", so this is a racing game where you can only pilot your car once at the very beginning of every track.

Controls:

  • Click and point to launch the car in the direction you want.
  • You can press 'R' to restart the level.

Inspired by Speed Racer and Space Cadet Pinball.

Our best times are:

  1. 0:02.415
  2. 0:01.698
  3. 0:01.390
  4. 0:00:933
  5. 0:01.258
  6. 0:02.164
  7. 0:01.648
  8. 0:01.937
  9. 0:01.829
  10. 0:02.191

Let us know what yours are in the comments! Any feedback welcome.
